mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
,
from euicc_profile
order by ${orderByClause}

select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,

select 'true' as QUERYID,
from euicc_profile where eid = #{eid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or ((state = '00' or state is null) and (eid is null or eid = '')) order by iccid
